mbean.name: TomcatJDBCPool
mbean.description: Provides per diagnostic metrics and notifications for JDBC operations

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: The number of established connections in the pool, idle and in use

attribute.name: idle
attribute.description: The number of established connections in the pool that are idle

attribute.name: numIdle
attribute.description: Same as the idle attribute

attribute.name: active
attribute.description: The number of established connections in the pool that are in use

attribute.name: numActive
attribute.description: Same as the active attribute

attribute.name: poolSweeperEnabled
attribute.description: Returns true if the pool has a background thread running

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: The JDBC url for this connection pool

attribute.name: driverClassName
attribute.description: The JDBC driver class for this connection pool

attribute.name: defaultAutoCommit
attribute.description: The JDBC auto commit setting for new connections

attribute.name: defaultReadOnly
attribute.description: The JDBC read only setting for new connections

attribute.name: defaultTransactionIsolation
attribute.description: The JDBC transaction isolation setting for new connections

attribute.name: connectionProperties
attribute.description: The connection properties that will be set for new connections. Format of the string will be [propertyName=property;]*

attribute.name: defaultCatalog
attribute.description: The JDBC transaction isolation setting for new connections

attribute.name: initialSize
attribute.description: The number of connections opened at pool startup

attribute.name: maxActive
attribute.description: The maximum number of open connections

attribute.name: maxIdle
attribute.description: The max number of idle connections

attribute.name: minIdle
attribute.description: The minimum number of open connections

attribute.name: maxWait
attribute.description: The time to wait in milliseconds before a SQLException is thrown when a connection is requested

attribute.name: validationQuery
attribute.description: The query to run during validation

attribute.name: validationQueryTimeout
attribute.description: The timeout in seconds before a connection validation queries fail

attribute.name: testOnBorrow
attribute.description: True if validation happens when a connection is requested

attribute.name: testOnReturn
attribute.description: True if validation happens when a connection is returned

attribute.name: testWhileIdle
attribute.description: True if validation happens when a connection is not in use (idle)

attribute.name: timeBetweenEvictionRunsMillis
attribute.description: Sleep time for background thread in between pool checks

attribute.name: numTestsPerEvictionRun
attribute.description: Not in use

attribute.name: minEvictableIdleTimeMillis
attribute.description: Minimum amount of time a connection stays idle before it is evicted

attribute.name: accessToUnderlyingConnectionAllowed
attribute.description: Returns true if one can retrieve the actual JDBC connection

attribute.name: removeAbandoned
attribute.description: Returns true if connection in use can be timed out

attribute.name: removeAbandonedTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout in seconds for connections in use

attribute.name: logAbandoned
attribute.description: If true, stack trace will be recorded and printed out for timed out connection

attribute.name: loginTimeout
attribute.description: Not in use

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The name of the connection pool, will be used in the ObjectName of the actual pool

attribute.name: password
attribute.description: For security purposes,this doesn't return anything

attribute.name: username
attribute.description: The username used to open connections

attribute.name: validationInterval
attribute.description: If larger than zero than validation will only occur after the interval milliseconds has passed

attribute.name: initSQL
attribute.description: A SQL executed once per connection, when it is established

attribute.name: testOnConnect
attribute.description: Validate connection after connection has been established

attribute.name: jdbcInterceptors
attribute.description: The interceptors configured for this pool

attribute.name: jmxEnabled
attribute.description: Register the pool with JMX or not

attribute.name: fairQueue
attribute.description: a fair queue is being used by the connection pool

attribute.name: abandonWhenPercentageFull
attribute.description: Connections that have been abandoned isn't closed unless connections in use are above this percentage

attribute.name: maxAge
attribute.description: Time in milliseconds to keep this connection alive even when used

attribute.name: useEquals
attribute.description: Set to true if you wish the ProxyConnection class to use String.equals and set to false when you wish to use == when comparing method names

attribute.name: useLock
attribute.description: If true, use a lock when operations are performed on the connection object

attribute.name: suspectTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout in seconds for connection that suspected to have been abandoned

attribute.name: rollbackOnReturn
attribute.description: If autoCommit==false then the pool can terminate the transaction by calling rollback on the connection as it is returned to the pool

attribute.name: commitOnReturn
attribute.description: If autoCommit==false then the pool can complete the transaction by calling commit on the connection as it is returned to the pool

attribute.name: alternateUsernameAllowed
attribute.description: If true, getConnection(username,password) is allowed

attribute.name: dataSource
attribute.description: Data source that is injected into the pool

attribute.name: dataSourceJNDI
attribute.description: The JNDI name for a data source to be looked up

attribute.name: useDisposableConnectionFacade
attribute.description: If true, connection pool is configured to use a connection facade to prevent re-use of connection after close() has been invoked

attribute.name: logValidationErrors
attribute.description: Log errors during the validation phase to the log file

attribute.name: validatorClassName
attribute.description: The name of validator class which implements org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.Validator interface

attribute.name: waitCount
attribute.description: The number of threads waiting for a connection

attribute.name: propagateInterruptState
attribute.description: If true, propagate the interrupt state for a thread that has been interrupted

attribute.name: ignoreExceptionOnPreLoad
attribute.description: If true, ignore error of connection creation while initializing the pool

attribute.name: useStatementFacade
attribute.description: If true, connection pool is configured to wrap statements.

attribute.name: borrowedCount
attribute.description: The total number of connections borrowed from this pool

attribute.name: createdCount
attribute.description: The total number of connections created by this pool

attribute.name: returnedCount
attribute.description: The total number of connections returned to this pool

attribute.name: releasedCount
attribute.description: The total number of connections released from this pool

attribute.name: reconnectedCount
attribute.description: The total number of connections reconnected by this pool.

attribute.name: removeAbandonedCount
attribute.description: The total number of connections released by remove abandoned.

attribute.name: releasedIdleCount
attribute.description: The total number of connections released by eviction.

operation.name: checkIdle
operation.description: forces a check of idle connections

operation.name: checkAbandoned
operation.description: forces a check of abandoned connections

operation.name: testIdle
operation.description: forces a validation of abandoned connections

operation.name: purge
operation.description: Purges all connections in the pool

operation.name: purgeOnReturn
operation.description: Purges connections when they are returned from the pool

operation.name: resetStats
operation.description: reset the statistics of this pool.
